title: Teacher suspended after ‘joking’ about using sniper rifle on Greta Thunberg
text:
Matt Baish, a teacher at Waterloo West High School, was suspended over a threatening comment about a Greta Thunberg visit in Iowa City (Picture: Facebook/Google Maps)

A teacher was suspended over a threatening Facebook post about 16-year-old climate activist Greta Thunberg.

Matt Baish, a teacher at Waterloo West High School wrote a comment saying ‘Don’t have my sniper rifle’ on a Facebook post about Thunberg’s visit to Iowa City for a climate strike event on Friday.

The school district put Baish on leave for his comment, citing their social media policy that tells staff not to make threats of violence or bodily harm.

Some claimed the Baish’s comment was sarcastic, but parents of students at the high school said they were disturbed by the comment and the message it sends to Baish’s students – many of whom are Thunberg’s age.

Anne Phillips, whose child attends the school told KWWL: ‘I was honestly frightened. I was pretty shocked that that sort of comment would be made to someone in the same age group as the kids he was teaching.’

Phillips continued: ‘To have them have to enter a classroom where they don’t feel safe, where they don’t feel they can share their opinion, where they don’t feel respected, we as parents have to stand up against that.’

Baish’s comment was made on a post by Mason Severson, who was asking who would be attending the climate strike event.

Severson said: ‘My response originally was his commentary was very vile, and a lot of people carried that same thought on with it. They thought he was just very sick and demented for making that comment over such a simple post.’

Baish’s Facebook account now appears to be inactive.

Thunberg has drawn both criticism and support for hitting out at world leaders for not taking climate change seriously.

I won’t be held hostage by someone who just got a learner’s permit. Sorry kiddo! Tell Al to try again.’

Trump retweeted the post and wrote: ‘Keep up the great work Kellie!’
description: Matt Baish, a teacher at Waterloo West High School wrote a comment saying 'Don't have my sniper rifle' on a Facebook post about Thunberg's visit to Iowa City
